article.title: Kongsberg Supports Remotely Operated Weapon System
article.text: Kongsberg Defence and Aerospace, Kongsberg, Norway, was awarded a $7,898,000 modification (P00103) to contract (W15QKN-12-C-0103) to exercise contract line number 0100 on the base contract for depot support for the Common Remotely Operated Weapon System. Army Contracting Command Picatinny Arsenal, Pennsylvania is the contracting activity.
